text: int main ( ) { int T ; scanf ( "%d" , & T ) ; while ( T -- > 0 ) { int N ; scanf ( "%d" , & N ) ; int Arr [ N ] ; for ( int i = 0 ; i < N ; i ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & Arr [ i ] ) ; } int Prev = Arr [ 0 ] ; long Count = 1 ; long Ans = N ; for ( int i = 1 ; i < N ; i ++ ) { if ( Arr [ i ] >= Prev ) { Count ++ ; } else { Ans += ( Count * ( Count + 1 ) / 2 ) - Count ; Count = 1 ; } Prev = Arr [ i ] ; } Ans += ( Count * ( Count + 1 ) / 2 ) - Count ; printf ( "%ld\n" , Ans ) ; } return 0 ; }
